Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local quiver local quiverWeld local arrows = {} local quiverArrow
local PlayShoot
local LAUNCH_SPEED = 60 local SPREAD_IN_STUDS = 20
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
arrow = Instance.new("Part") arrow.FormFactor = 'Custom' arrow.Shape = "Block" arrow.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 3.0) arrow.CanCollide = false arrow.Name = "Arrow"
arrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") arrowMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=108195621" arrowMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=108195690" arrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.25, 1.25, 1.25) arrowMesh.Parent = arrow
local arrowWeld
function shoot(arrow, direction) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then return end
local BowSound = Bow:FindFirstChild('BowSound') if BowSound then BowSound:Play() end local ArrowSound = Bow:FindFirstChild('ArrowSound') if ArrowSound then local cloneSound = ArrowSound:Clone() cloneSound.Parent = arrow end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.Torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + direction.unit * 7.0
local arrowSparkle = Instance.new('Sparkles') arrowSparkle.SparkleColor = Color3.new(43/255,255/255,18/255) arrowSparkle.Parent = arrow
arrow.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) -- * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)
local arrowFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") arrowFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, arrow:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) arrowFloat.Parent = arrow
arrow.Velocity = direction.unit * LAUNCH_SPEED arrow.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) arrow.Name ="arrow" arrow.Parent = game.Workspace arrow.CanCollide = false
local arrowTrail = Instance.new('Smoke') arrowTrail.RiseVelocity = 0 arrowTrail.Size = 0.25 arrowTrail.Parent = arrow
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Parent = arrow
local newScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("OnTouchScript"):Clone() newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = arrow
debris:AddItem(arrow, 5) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if PlayShoot then PlayShoot.Value = not PlayShoot.Value end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso == nil then return end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
wait(0.3) if quiverArrow then quiverArrow.Transparency = 1 end
local handArrow local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') if rightArm then handArrow = arrow:Clone() handArrow.Parent = rightArm
local handWeld = Instance.new('Weld') handWeld.Name = 'HandWeld' handWeld.Part0 = rightArm handWeld.Part1 = handArrow handWeld.C0 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0,0) * CFrame.new(0,0,-1.4) * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi/3, 0) * CFrame.new(0,0,-0.5) --handWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0,0,-2)--(CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/3,0) + Vector3.new(0.95, 0, 2)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) handWeld.Parent = handArrow end
wait(0.5) if handArrow then handArrow:Destroy() end target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint direction = (target - vCharacter.Torso.Position).unit
local theta = math.atan((SPREAD_IN_STUDS / 2) / math.min(50, (target - vCharacter.Torso.Position).magnitude)) print("atan(" .. SPREAD_IN_STUDS / 2 .. "/" .. (target - vCharacter.Torso.Position).magnitude .. ") =" .. theta) theta = math.min(theta, math.pi/3) for i = -theta, theta, theta/3 do shoot(arrow:Clone(), CFrame.Angles(0, i, 0) * direction) end
wait(1.7) if quiverArrow then quiverArrow.Transparency = 0 end Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() print("On equip") vCharacter = Tool.Parent torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then -- and vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Quiver") == nil then --[[ quiver = Instance.new("Part") quiver.Name = "Quiver" quiver.Shape = "Block" quiver.FormFactor = 'Custom' quiver.Size = Vector3.new(0.8, 2.6, 0.5) quiver.CanCollide = false quiver.Parent = vCharacter
quiverMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") quiverMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=99175197" quiverMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=99175144" quiverMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2,1.2,1.2) quiverMesh.Parent = quiver
quiverWeld = Instance.new("Weld") quiverWeld.Name = "QuiverHolder" quiverWeld.Part0 = torso quiverWeld.Part1 = quiver quiverWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-0.15, -0.2, -0.65)) * CFrame.Angles(0,0,math.pi / 8) quiverWeld.Parent = torso
quiverArrow = arrow:Clone() quiverArrow.Name = 'QuiverArrow' quiverArrow.Parent = vCharacter
local quiverArrowWeld = Instance.new('Weld') quiverArrowWeld.Name = 'ArrowHolder' quiverArrowWeld.Part0 = quiver quiverArrowWeld.Part1 = quiverArrow quiverArrowWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(-0.15, 0, -0.4) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) quiverArrowWeld.Parent = quiver --]] rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") ---[[ if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") end if rightGrip then rightGrip.Parent = leftArm rightGrip.Name = "LeftGrip" rightGrip.Part0 = leftArm rightGrip.Part1 = Bow end --]] end PlayShoot = WaitForChild(Tool, 'PlayShoot') end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
if torso then quiver = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Quiver") quiverWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("QuiverHolder") end if quiverArrow then quiverArrow:Destroy() end if quiver then quiver:Destroy() end if quiverWeld then quiverWeld:Destroy() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local arrow = script.Parent
local damage = 33
local activated = false
function onTouch(hit) if hit.Parent and hit.Name ~= 'arrow' then vChar = hit.Parent humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then tag = arrow:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag.Parent = humanoid end if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 45 end if activated then return end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) print('Damaged guy') activated = true end arrow:Destroy() end end
arrow.Touched:connect(onTouch)
wait(0.25)
local arrowSound = arrow:FindFirstChild('ArrowSound') if arrowSound then arrowSound:Play() else print('No Arrow Sound') end

-- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local Animations = {} local MyHumanoid local MyCharacter
local function PlayAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Play() else print("Can't find animation:" , animationName) end end
local function StopAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Stop() end end
local function ConnectAnimationToValueChange(valueName, animationName) return WaitForChild(Tool, valueName).Changed:connect( function (value) --if value then PlayAnimation(animationName) --else -- StopAnimation('SlashAnim') --end end) end
function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = WaitForChild(MyCharacter, 'Humanoid') if MyHumanoid then Animations['IdleAnim'] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool, 'BowWalk')) Animations['ShootAnim'] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool, 'ArrowAnim')) end wait() if Tool:IsDescendantOf(Workspace) then PlayAnimation('IdleAnim') end end
function OnUnequipped() StopAnimation('ShootAnim') StopAnimation('IdleAnim') end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
ConnectAnimationToValueChange('PlayShoot', 'ShootAnim')
